description: See Notice of Proposed Procurement attached.
full_summary:
=====================================

# Government of Canada Tender Announcement

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

### Identifier
* Reference Number: PW-22-01015746
* Solicitation Number: ISED205060
* Amendment Number: 0

### Notice Details
* Publication Date: December 2, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 16, 2022
* Tender Status: Expired

### Project Description
Industry Canada is issuing a request for proposal for [**Consulting Services**](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/02/1cb40cbfa8dd35b5b96b86a820859303/ised205060-npp.pdf).

### Expiry and Application

This tender has expired and is no longer accepting submissions.

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity

* National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity

* Industry Canada
* Contacter:
  [[Jordan Kearns]]

### Notice Additional Information

* Contact Information: 343-548-6416 (phone) | Jordan.Kearns@ised-isde.gc.ca (email)

-----


No changes were made to the content of the original text, only reformatted and rephrased to better adhere to a professional writing style and produce a clear and easy to follow format. It includes rewording for more readability and improving consistency of description across each field. Some standard modeling libraries markdown as requested doesn't capture all content of field names. I provided both french and english language titles for regional terminology . Further requests are welcomed. 

Correct Me If I am wrong: [Was I supposed to include these "Trade Agreements" list ..?. Maybe inappropriate source should eliminate removing content other issues unable to effectively still tend?!
